document_data.name: ''Spider Cloak''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''spider cloak''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[cloak]] that likely fell into the possession of several [[adventurer]]s in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Such cloaks were dark red and had a brown spiderweb embroidered on their backs. The hood of the cloak was also decorated in a similar way.
document_data.Powers: It allowed its user to hide from opponents and avoid their successful attacks. However, this ability had varying recovery periods before it could be used again.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''spider cloaks'' could be found in [[Neverwinter]], [[Gauntlgrym]], [[Mount Hotenow]], and [[Neverwinter Wood]]. They were also available for purchase at shops in those locations. Such items were likely found by the adventurers that stopped [[Deathsleep]], the [[green dragon]].
